p: Based on existing surveillance data and publicly-available reports, YF had been reported at least once over the 1984â€“2013 period in 160 of 479 provinces ( Fig 1A). Relying on various environmental and demographic covariates, the GLM reproduced the presence/absence of YF well with an area under the ROC curve >0.9 for both model variants ( Table 1 and S1 Fig).
